description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2 PM EDT on 31 May 2023. PWGSC, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is issuing this request for proposal for the acquisition of an automatic cardboard cutter for the manufacture of boxes including delivery, installation, commissioning and training located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada, as detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice

## Automatic Cardboard Cutter for Box Manufacturing

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites tenders for the acquisition of an automatic cardboard cutter for the manufacture of boxes.

### Key Details

* Tender Reference Number: WS3899151273
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: WS3899151273
* Publication Date: May 4, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: May 31, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: June 8, 2023

### Specifications

* UNSPSC Code: 23152900 (Packaging machinery)
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region)

### Tender Status

The tender has expired, and bids submitted after the closing date and time will be declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or further information, please contact:

Stephen Phan
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Phone: Not provided
Email: [stephen.phan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stephen.phan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tender Description

The successful bidder will be required to deliver, install, commission, and provide training for an automatic cardboard cutter for the manufacture of boxes, as detailed in Annex A. All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by the tender closing date and time.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is governed by the Canadian trade agreement and is open to bidders who are registered under the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) or other eligible trade agreements.

### Notice URL

You can access the full tender notice on the Ariba Discovery website at the following URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16164823?extsite=MTYxNjQ4MjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16164823?extsite=MTYxNjQ4MjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
